message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI 

This paper deals with natural language processing and machine learning techniques to identify agreement and disagreement between utterances that express stances towards a topic of discussion. It proposes a novel method called Reason Comparing Network (RCN) to leverage reason information for stance comparison. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
